Via Rita Levi Montalcini 11  
Buggiano (PT) 51011 - ITALY  
+39-338-4442452  
fspadarella@gmail.com  
 
1st February 2021  
I know of a new position at your company as a Global Product Manager - Autoimmunity.  
I am  attaching  my CV to this letter as part of my application.  
As you can read from my CV, I have several years of experience in chemiluminescence.  
I was immediately involved in the launch, promotion and development  of Menarini's Zenit RA system.  
Since 2010,  I have been dealing with the Autoimmunity line as Italy Product Manager . My duties are from 
the promotion of the instrumentation towards the internal customer ( sales  reps and application specialist) 
and the external one (Hospitals, Private Analysis Laboratories), to the 360 -degree management of t he line 
and its equipment.  
I am  involved in  forecast, sales analysis, and response  to tenders complex, preparation of marketing 
material as an aid to sales and as scientific dissemination, follow -up clinical evaluations carried out  by kol.  
In addition to the CLIA, I also deal with the entire IFA and BLOT area, always with the same tasks.  
In 2020,  I also started following another instrumentation in eCLIA, so that I expanded my knowledge on 
chemiluminescence and on viral and clinical c hemistry markers.  
Given my scholar instruction  I am very interested in the instruments and their operation, I like to 
understand how the various instruments  work and how is possibl e improve them , both on the user 
interfa ce and on the application side.  
I strong believe that immunometry in CLIA  or eCLIA  is the future for Autoimmunity since the IFA presents 
many critical issues, e specially in terms of expertise . 
I am very attracted to the possibility of working for an instrument manufacturer rather than  a distributor 
above all to try to improve the product more and more to be able in the best way to satisfy the customer 
and the company for which I work. I would also like to give my contribution in improving the 
instrumentation and meeting customer expect ations as much as possible, as well as developing new 
business collaborations.

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
